title: Salam! 🖖🏽
text: Welcome to my webpage, where I bridge the realms of earth sciences, numerical modeling, backend technologies, web computation, and data science.

title: Salam! 🖖🏽
text:
About Me
🌎 Academic Background: Geosciences and Physics (Undergraduate), Earth System Data Science and Remote Sensing (Graduate)
🔬 Research Enthusiast: Unraveling Earth’s secrets through numerical and statistical models
💻 Backend Devotee: Crafting robust and efficient systems
🌐 Web Wizard: Translating complex computations into user-friendly interfaces
📊 Data Whisperer: Transforming raw data into meaningful stories
👨🏻‍🏫 Knowledge Sharer: Giving workshops and courses on cool methods

title: Salam! 🖖🏽
text:
What’s Cookin’
📚 Currently delving into the depths of numerical and statistical modeling techniques to simulate Earth’s dynamic processes via Digital Twins.
🔧 Building sophisticated backend systems that power cutting-edge scientific applications ranging from ML/AI pipelines to dynamic Digital Twin wokflows.
🧮 Modeling complex systems using advances in science, statistics, and techonolgies.
🌐 Creating interactive web experiences that bring computational sense to the masses.
📈 Taming complex datasets to reveal patterns, trends, and insights that inspire change.

title: Salam! 🖖🏽
text:
Let’s Collaborate!
🌱 Open to collaborations on exciting projects at the intersection of earth systems, physics, and technology.
💬 Hit the mail button in the menu and feel free to reach out for discussions, brainstorming, or simply a virtual chat.
